   20: -module(io_proto_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([setopts_getopts/1,unicode_options/1,unicode_options_gen/1, 
   26: 	 binary_options/1, read_modes_gl/1,
   27: 	 read_modes_ogl/1, broken_unicode/1,eof_on_pipe/1,
   28:          unicode_prompt/1, shell_slogan/1, raw_stdout/1, raw_stdout_isatty/1,
   29:          file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1, file_read_stdin_list_mode/1,
   30:          file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode/1,
   31:          file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode/1,
   32:          file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode/1,
   33:          file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode/1,
   34:          io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode/1, io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode/1,
   35:          io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1,
   36:          file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode/1,
   37:          file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode/1,
   38:          io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode/1
   39:         ]).
   40: 
   41: 
   42: -export([io_server_proxy/1,start_io_server_proxy/0, proxy_getall/1, 
   43: 	 proxy_setnext/2, proxy_quit/1]).
   44: %% For spawn
   45: -export([answering_machine1/3, answering_machine2/3]).
   46: 
   47: -export([uprompt/1, slogan/0, session_slogan/0]).
   48: 
   49: -export([write_raw_to_stdout/0, read_raw_from_stdin/1]).
   50: 
   51: %%-define(debug, true).
   52: 
   53: -ifdef(debug).
   54: -define(dbg(Data),io:format(standard_error, "DBG: ~p\r\n",[Data])).
   55: -else.
   56: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
   57: -endif.
   58: 
   59: suite() ->
   60:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   61:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   62: 
   63: all() -> 
   64:     [setopts_getopts, unicode_options, unicode_options_gen,
   65:      binary_options, read_modes_gl, read_modes_ogl,
   66:      broken_unicode, eof_on_pipe, unicode_prompt,
   67:      shell_slogan, raw_stdout, raw_stdout_isatty,
   68:      file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   69:      file_read_stdin_list_mode,
   70:      file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode,
   71:      file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode,
   72:      file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode,
   73:      file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode,
   74:      io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode,
   75:      io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode,
   76:      io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   77:      file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode,
   78:      file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode,
   79:      io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode
   80:     ].
   81: 
   82: groups() -> 
   83:     [].
   84: 
   85: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   86:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
   87:     os:putenv("TERM","vt100"),
   88:     DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
   89:     [{default_shell,DefShell},{term, Term}|Config].
   90: 
   91: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   92:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
   93:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
   94:     ok.
   95: 
   96: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   97:     Config.
   98: 
   99: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  100:     Config.
  101: 
  102: -record(state, {
  103:                 q = [],
  104:                 nxt = eof,
  105:                 mode = list
  106:                }).
  107: 
  108: uprompt(_L) ->
  109:     [1050,1072,1082,1074,1086,32,1077,32,85,110,105,99,111,100,101,32,63].
  110: 
  111: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  112: unicode_prompt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  113:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  114:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  115: 	new ->
  116: 	    rtnode:run(
  117:               [{putline,""},
  118:                {putline, "2."},
  119:                {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  120:                {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  121:                {expect, "[\n ]default"},
  122:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  123:                {putline, "hej"},
  124:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  125:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  126:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  127:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  128:                {putline, "hej"},
  129:                {expect,"[\n ]hej"},
  130:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  131:               ],[],"",["-pa",PA]);
  132:         _ ->
  133:             ok
  134:     end,
  135:     %% And one with oldshell
  136:     rtnode:run(
  137:       [{putline,""},
  138:        {putline, "2."},
  139:        {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  140:        {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  141:        {expect, "default"},
  142:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  143:        {putline, "hej"},
  144:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  145:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  146:        {expect, "[\n ]\\?*ok"},
  147:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  148:        {putline, "hej"},
  149:        {expect,"[\n ]\\?*hej"},
  150:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  151:       ],[],"",["-oldshell","-pa",PA]),
  152:     ok.
  153: 
  154: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  155: shell_slogan(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  156:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  157:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  158: 	new ->
  159: 	    rtnode:run(
  160:               [{expect, "\\Q"++string:trim(erlang:system_info(system_version))++"\\E"},
  161:                {expect, "\\Q"++io_lib:format("Eshell V~s (press Ctrl+G to abort, type help(). for help)",[erlang:system_info(version)])++"\\E"}
  162:               ],[],"",[]),
  163:       	    rtnode:run(
  164:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  165:                {expect, "\nTest session slogan \\("}
  166:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","\"Test slogan\"",
  167:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","\"Test session slogan\""]),
  168:       	    rtnode:run(
  169:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  170:                {expect, "\\Q\nTest session slogan (\\E"}
  171:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:slogan/0",
  172:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:session_slogan/0",
  173:                        "-pa",PA]);
  174:         _ ->
  175:             ok
  176:     end.
  177: 
  178: slogan() ->
  179:     "Test slogan".
  180: session_slogan() ->
  181:     "Test session slogan".
  182: 
  183: %% Check io:setopts and io:getopts functions.
  184: setopts_getopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  185:     FileName = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  186: 			      "io_proto_SUITE_setopts_getopts.dat"]),
  187:     {ok,WFile} = file:open(FileName,[write]),
  188:     Server = start_io_server_proxy(),
  189:     [{binary, false}] = io:getopts(Server),
  190:     [getopts] = proxy_getall(Server),
  191:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(WFile)),
  192:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  193:     "Hej" = io:get_line(Server,''),
  194:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  195:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_line(Server,''),
  196:     ok = io:setopts(Server,[{binary,true}]),
  197:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  198:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  199:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  200:     <<72,101,106,200,148>> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  201:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~ts",[<<72,101,106,200,148>>])),
  202:     file:write(WFile,<<"HejA">>),
  203:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,unicode)),
  204:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,big})),
  205:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,little})),
  206:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,big})),
  207:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,little})),
  208:     file:close(WFile),
  209:     {ok,RFile} = file:open(FileName,[read]),
  210:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  211:     [$H,$e,$j,$A] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  212:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  213:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  214:     [{binary,false},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  215:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  216:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  217:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  218: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  219:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  220:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  221:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  222: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  223:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  224:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  225:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  226: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  227:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  228:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  229:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  230: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  231:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  232:     file:position(RFile,0),
  233:     io:setopts(RFile,[{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}]),
  234:     <<$H,$e,$j,$A>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  235:     [{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  236:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  237:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  238:     [{binary,true},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  239:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  240:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  241:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  242: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  243:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  244:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  245:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  246: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  247:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  248:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  249:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  250: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  251:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  252:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  253:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  254: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  255:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  256:     file:close(RFile),
  257:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  258: 	new ->
  259: 	    %% So, lets test another node with new interactive shell
  260: 	    rtnode:run(
  261:               [{putline,""},
  262:                {putline, "2."},
  263:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  264:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  265:                {expect, "{binary,false}"},
  266:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  267:                {putline, "hej"},
  268:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  269:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  270:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  271:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  272:                {putline, "hej"},
  273:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  274:               ],[]);
  275:         _ ->
  276:             ok
  277:     end,
  278:     %% And one with oldshell
  279:     rtnode:run(
  280:       [{putline,""},
  281:        {putline, "2."},
  282:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  283:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  284:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
  285:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  286:        {putline, "hej"},
  287:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  288:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  289:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  290:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  291:        {putline, "hej"},
  292:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  293:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
  294:     ok.
  295: 
  296: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  297: file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  298:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  299: 
  300:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  301:     {ok, "got: <<\"abc\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  302:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  303:     {ok, "got: <<\"def\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  304:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  305:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  306: 
  307:     ok.
  308: 
  309: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  310: file_read_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  311:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  312: 
  313:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  314:     {ok, "got: \"abc\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  315:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  316:     {ok, "got: \"def\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  317:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  318:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  319: 
  320:     ok.
  321: 
  322: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read returns
  323: %% correct error when in binary mode
  324: file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  325:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  326: 
  327:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ęö€"/utf8>>),
  328:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  329:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  330:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  331: 
  332:     ok.
  333: 
  334: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read returns
  335: %% correct error when in list mode
  336: file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode(_Config) ->
  337:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  338: 
  339:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ęö€"/utf8>>),
  340:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  341:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  342:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  343: 
  344:     ok.
  345: 
  346: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line returns
  347: %% correct error when in binary mode
  348: file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  349:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, [binary]),
  350: 
  351:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ę\nö\n€"/utf8>>),
  352:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  353:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  354:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  355: 
  356:     ok.
  357: 
  358: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line returns
  359: %% correct error when in list mode
  360: file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode(_Config) ->
  361:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, [list]),
  362: 
  363:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ę\nö\n€"/utf8>>),
  364:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  365:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  366:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  367: 
  368:     ok.
  369: 
  370: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  371: io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  372:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  373:                          fun() ->
  374:                                  case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  375:                                      eof -> eof;
  376:                                      Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  377:                                  end
  378:                          end, [binary]),
  379: 
  380:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  381:     {ok, "got: <<\"x\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  382:     {ok, "got: <<\"\\n\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  383:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  384:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  385: 
  386:     ok.
  387: 
  388: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  389: io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  390:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  391:                          fun() -> case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  392:                                       eof -> eof;
  393:                                       Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  394:                                   end
  395:                          end, [list]),
  396: 
  397:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  398:     {ok, "got: \"x\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  399:     {ok, "got: \"\\n\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  400:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  401:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  402: 
  403:     ok.
  404: 
  405: %% Test that mixing io:get_chars and file:read works when stdin is in binary mode.
  406: io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  407:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  408:                          fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 1) of
  409:                                       eof -> eof;
  410:                                       {ok, Chars} ->
  411:                                           case io:get_line(standard_io, "") of
  412:                                               eof -> Chars;
  413:                                               Line ->
  414:                                                   {ok, [Chars, Line]}
  415:                                           end
  416:                                   end
  417:                          end, [binary]),
  418: 
  419:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "1\n"),
  420:     {ok, "got: [<<\"1\">>,<<\"\\n\">>]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  421:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  422:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  423: 
  424:     ok.
  425: 
  426: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  427: file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  428:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  429:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  430:                          [binary],
  431:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  432: 
  433:     %% Invalid utf8
  434:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  435: 
  436:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  437:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  438:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  439:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  440:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  441: 
  442:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  443:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  444:                          [binary],
  445:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  446: 
  447:     %% Valid utf8
  448:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  449: 
  450:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  451:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  452:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  453:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  454:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  455: 
  456:     %% Setting using io:setopts used to hang on Windows, see #7459 for details.
  457:     {ok, P3, ErlPort3} = start_stdin_node(
  458:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  459:                          [binary],
  460:                          "-eval \"io:setopts([{encoding, latin1}])\""),
  461: 
  462:     %% Invalid utf8
  463:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort3, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  464: 
  465:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  466:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  467:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  468:     ErlPort3 ! {self(), close},
  469:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  470: 
  471:     ok.
  472: 
  473: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  474: file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode(_Config) ->
  475:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  476:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  477:                          [list],
  478:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  479: 
  480:     %% Invalid utf8
  481:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  482: 
  483:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  484:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  485:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  486:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  487:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  488: 
  489:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  490:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  491:                          [list],
  492:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  493: 
  494:     %% Valid utf8
  495:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  496: 
  497:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  498:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  499:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  500:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  501:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  502: 
  503:     ok.
  504: 
  505: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is not utf8,
  506: %% but unicode is printed out
  507: io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode(_Config) ->
  508:     {ok, P, ErlPort} =
  509:         start_stdin_node(
  510:           fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 5) of
  511:                        {ok, Chars} ->
  512:                            %% We've read a unicode string as latin1,
  513:                            %% which means that if we convert it to
  514:                            %% a binary it will be seen as the original
  515:                            %% unicode string.
  516:                            io:format("~ts",[list_to_binary(Chars)]),
  517:                            {ok, Chars};
  518:                        Else ->
  519:                            Else
  520:                    end
  521:           end,
  522:           [list],
  523:           "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  524: 
  525:     %% Valid utf8
  526:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"duπa"/utf8>>),
  527: 
  528:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  529:     receive
  530:         {ErlPort, {data, Data}} ->
  531:             %% On stdout any unicode should be translated to hex syntax
  532:             "du\\x{3C0}a" = Data
  533:     end,
  534: 
  535:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  536:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  537: 
  538:     ok.
  539: 
  540: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions) ->
  541:     start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, "").
  542: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, ExtraArgs) ->
  543:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[{active, false},{packet,4}]),
  544:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
  545:     Cmd = lists:append(
  546:             [ct:get_progname(),
  547:              " -noshell ",
  548:              ExtraArgs,
  549:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  550:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " read_raw_from_stdin ", integer_to_list(Port)]),
  551:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
  552:     ErlPort = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof, stderr_to_stdout,
  553:                                        {env, [{"LC_CTYPE","en_US.UTF-8"}]}]),
  554:     {ok, P} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  555:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(IoOptions)),
  556:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(ReadFun)),
  557:     {ok, P, ErlPort}.
  558: 
  559: read_raw_from_stdin([Port]) ->
  560:     try
  561:         {ok, P} = gen_tcp:connect(localhost, list_to_integer(atom_to_list(Port)),
  562:                                   [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
  563:         {ok, OptionsBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  564:         io:setopts(standard_io, binary_to_term(OptionsBin)),
  565:         {ok, ReadFunBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  566:         spawn(fun() ->
  567:                       gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  568:                       init:stop("crash")
  569:               end),
  570:         read_raw_from_stdin(binary_to_term(ReadFunBin), P)
  571:     catch E:R:ST ->
  572:             io:format(standard_error, "~p  ~p",[Port,{E,R,ST}])
  573:     end.
  574: read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P) ->
  575:     case ReadFun() of
  576:         eof ->
  577:             gen_tcp:send(P, "got: eof"),
  578:             init:stop();
  579:         {ok, Char} ->
  580:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  581:                               io_lib:format("got: ~p\n",[Char]))),
  582:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  583:         {ok, Fmt, Char} ->
  584:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  585:                               io_lib:format("got: "++Fmt++"\n",[Char]))),
  586:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  587:         {error, Reason} ->
  588:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  589:                               io_lib:format("error: ~p\n",[Reason]))),
  590:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P)
  591:     end.
  592: 
  593: get_lc_ctype() ->
  594:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
  595: 	{{unix,sunos},{5,N,_}} when N =< 8 ->
  596: 	    "iso_8859_1";
  597: 	_ ->
  598: 	    "ISO-8859-1"
  599:     end.
  600: 
  601: %% Test various unicode options.
  602: unicode_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  603:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  604:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  605:     %% A string in both russian and greek characters, which is present
  606:     %% in all the internal test files (but in different formats of course)...
  607:     TestData = [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
  608: 		1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
  609: 		1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
  610: 		32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
  611: 		963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963],
  612:     %% Testdata from Chinese open source customer, that triggered OTP-7974
  613:     TestData2 = [46,46,46,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,
  614: 		 12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,
  615: 		 12411,12370,44,44,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,12411,12370,12411,
  616: 		 12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,
  617: 		 12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,44,10],
  618: 
  619:     %% The external test files are generated with a BOM writing
  620:     %% text editor. A shorter line is written (with two characters 
  621:     %% larger than 127).
  622:     ExternalTestData = [197,116,101,114,101,114,246,118,114,97],
  623:     InternalBomFiles = ["testdata_utf8_bom.dat",
  624: 			"testdata_utf16_big_bom.dat",
  625: 			"testdata_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  626: 			"testdata_utf32_big_bom.dat",
  627: 			"testdata_utf32_little_bom.dat"],
  628:     AllNoBom = [{utf8,"testdata_utf8.dat"},
  629: 		{utf16,"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  630: 		{{utf16,big},"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  631: 		{{utf16,little},"testdata_utf16_little.dat"},
  632: 		{utf32,"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  633: 		{{utf32,big},"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  634: 		{{utf32,little},"testdata_utf32_little.dat"}],
  635:     ExternalBomFiles = ["external_utf8_bom.dat",
  636: 			"external_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  637: 			"external_utf16_big_bom.dat"],
  638:     ReadBomFile = fun(File,Dir) ->
  639: 			  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  640: 					     [read,binary]),
  641: 			  {ok,Bin} = file:read(F,4),
  642: 			  {Type,Bytes} = unicode:bom_to_encoding(Bin),
  643: 			  file:position(F,Bytes),
  644: 			  io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Type}]),
  645: 			  R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  646: 				io:get_chars(F,'',length(TestData)),unicode),
  647: 			  file:close(F),
  648: 			  R
  649: 		  end,
  650:     ReadBomlessFile = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  651: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  652: 						 [read,binary,
  653: 						  {encoding,Type}]),
  654: 			      R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  655: 				    io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),unicode),
  656: 			      file:close(F),
  657: 			      R
  658: 		      end,
  659:     ReadBomlessFileList = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  660: 				  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  661: 						     [read,
  662: 						      {encoding,Type}]),
  663: 				  R = io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),
  664: 				  file:close(F),
  665: 				  R
  666: 			  end,
  667:     ReadBomlessFileListLine = fun({Type,File},Dir) ->
  668: 				      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  669: 							 [read,
  670: 							  {encoding,Type}]),
  671: 				      R = io:get_line(F,''),
  672: 				      file:close(F),
  673: 				      R
  674: 			      end,
  675:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- InternalBomFiles ],
  676:     [ExternalTestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- ExternalBomFiles ],
  677:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  678:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  679:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  680: 
  681:     BomDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMDATA"]),
  682:     BomlessDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMLESSDATA"]),
  683:     file:make_dir(BomDir),
  684:     file:make_dir(BomlessDir),
  685: 
  686:     WriteBomFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  687: 			   {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  688: 					      [write,binary]),
  689: 			   file:write(F,unicode:encoding_to_bom(Enc)),
  690: 			   io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Enc}]),
  691: 			   io:put_chars(F,TestData),
  692: 			   file:close(F),
  693: 			   ok
  694: 		   end,
  695:     [ ok = WriteBomFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  696:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,BomDir) || {_,F} <- AllNoBom ],
  697:     WriteBomlessFile = fun({Enc,File},TData,Dir) ->
  698: 			       {ok,F} = file:open(
  699: 					  filename:join([Dir,File]),
  700: 					  [write,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  701: 			       io:put_chars(F,TData),
  702: 			       file:close(F),
  703: 			       ok
  704: 		       end,
  705:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  706:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  707:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  708:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  709: 
  710:     CannotReadFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  711: 			     %%io:format(standard_error,"~s\r\n",[filename:join([Dir,File])]),
  712: 			     {ok,F} = file:open(
  713: 					filename:join([Dir,File]),
  714: 					[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  715: 			     Enc2 = case Enc of
  716: 					utf8 ->
  717: 					    unicode;
  718: 					Tpl when is_tuple(Tpl) ->
  719: 					    Tpl;
  720: 					Atom when is_atom(Atom) ->
  721: 					    {Atom, big}
  722: 				    end,
  723: 			     {error, {no_translation,Enc2,latin1}} = 
  724: 				 file:read(F,10),
  725: 			     {error,terminated} = io:get_chars(F,'',10),
  726: 			     ok
  727: 		     end,
  728:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  729:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  730:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  731: 
  732:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData2,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  733:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  734:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  735:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  736: 
  737: 
  738:     FailDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"FAIL"]),
  739:     file:make_dir(FailDir),
  740: 
  741:     CannotWriteFile = fun({_Enc,File},Dir) ->
  742: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(
  743: 					 filename:join([Dir,File]),
  744: 					 [write,binary]),
  745: 			      {'EXIT', {no_translation,_}} =
  746: 				  (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  747: 			      {'EXIT', {terminated,_}} = (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  748: 			      ok
  749: 		      end,
  750:     [ ok = CannotWriteFile(F,FailDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  751: 
  752:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  753: 	new ->
  754: 	    %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
  755: 	    rtnode:run(
  756:               [{putline,""},
  757:                {putline, "2."},
  758:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  759:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  760:                {expect, "{encoding,latin1}"},
  761:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  762:                {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  763:                {putline, "io:setopts([unicode])."},
  764:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  765:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  766:                {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  767:               ],[],"",["-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]);
  768:         _ ->
  769:             ok
  770:     end,
  771:     rtnode:run(
  772:       [{putline,""},
  773:        {putline, "2."},
  774:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  775:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  776:        {expect, "[\n ]{encoding,latin1}"},
  777:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  778:        {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  779:        {putline, "io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."},
  780:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  781:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  782:        {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  783:       ],[],"",
  784:       ["-oldshell","-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
  785:     ok.
  786: 
  787: %% Tests various unicode options on random generated files.
  788: unicode_options_gen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  789:     ct:timetrap({minutes,30}), %% valgrind needs a alot of time
  790:     rand:seed(default),
  791:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
  792:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  793:     AllModes = [utf8,utf16,{utf16,big},{utf16,little},
  794: 		utf32,{utf32,big},{utf32,little}],
  795:     FSize = 9*1024,
  796:     NumItersRead = 2,
  797:     NumItersWrite = 2,
  798:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, "GENDATA1"),
  799:     file:make_dir(Dir),
  800: 
  801:     DoOneFile1 =
  802: 	fun(Encoding, N, M) ->
  803: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  804: 		io:format("Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  805: 		io:format(standard_error,
  806: 			  "Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p\r\n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  807: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  808: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  809: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  810: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  811: 		Bin = unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist, utf8, Encoding),
  812: 		ok = file:write_file(Fname, Bin),
  813: 
  814: 		Read1 = fun(FD) -> io:get_line(FD, '') end,
  815: 		Res1 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  816: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  817: 				       Read1),
  818: 
  819: 		Read2 = fun(FD) -> io:get_chars(FD, '', M) end,
  820: 		Res2 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  821: 				       [read,binary,
  822: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  823: 				       Read2),
  824: 
  825: 		Read3 = fun(FD) ->
  826: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  827: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  828: 				    Other -> Other end
  829: 			end,
  830: 		Res3 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  831: 				       [read,binary,
  832: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  833: 				       Read3),
  834: 
  835: 		Read4 = fun(FD) ->
  836: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  837: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  838: 				    Other -> Other end
  839: 			end,
  840: 		Res4 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  841: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  842: 				       Read4),
  843: 
  844: 		Ulist2 = [X || X <- Ulist, X =/= $\n, X =/= $\s, X =/= $\t],
  845: 		Ulist = done(Res1),
  846: 		Ulist = done(Res2),
  847: 		Ulist2 = done(Res3),
  848: 		Ulist2 = done(Res4),
  849: 
  850: 		file:delete(Fname)
  851: 	end,
  852:     [ [ [ DoOneFile1(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
  853: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
  854: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersRead) ],
  855: 
  856:     DoOneFile2 =
  857: 	fun(Encoding,N,M) ->
  858: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  859: 		io:format("Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  860: 		io:format(standard_error,
  861: 			  "Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p\r\n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  862: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  863: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  864: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  865: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  866: 
  867: 		Res1 = write_read_file(Fname, 1,
  868: 				       [write],
  869: 				       Encoding,
  870: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
  871: 
  872: 		Res2 = write_read_file(Fname, 2,
  873: 				       [write,binary],
  874: 				       Encoding,
  875: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
  876: 
  877: 		Fun3 = fun(FD) ->
  878: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~tc", [C]) || C <- Ulist],
  879: 			       ok
  880: 		       end,
  881: 		Res3 = write_read_file(Fname, 3,
  882: 				       [write],
  883: 				       Encoding,
  884: 				       Fun3),
  885: 
  886: 		Fun4 = fun(FD) ->
  887: 			       io:put_chars(FD,
  888: 					    unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist))
  889: 		       end,
  890: 		Res4 = write_read_file(Fname, 4,
  891: 				       [write],
  892: 				       Encoding,
  893: 				       Fun4),
  894: 
  895: 		LL = string:tokens(Ulist, "\n"),
  896: 		Fun5 = fun(FD) ->
  897: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~ts", [L]) || L <- LL],
  898: 			       ok
  899: 		       end,
  900: 		Res5 = write_read_file(Fname, 5,
  901: 				       [write],
  902: 				       Encoding,
  903: 				       Fun5),
  904: 
  905: 		Ulist2 = lists:flatten(LL),
  906: 		ResBin = done(Res1),
  907: 		ResBin = done(Res2),
  908: 		ResBin = done(Res3),
  909: 		ResBin = done(Res4),
  910: 		Ulist = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin, Encoding),
  911: 
  912: 		ResBin2 = done(Res5),
  913: 		Ulist2 = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin2, Encoding),
  914: 
  915: 		ok
  916: 	end,
  917:     [ [ [ DoOneFile2(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
  918: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
  919: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersWrite) ],
  920:     ok.
  921: 
  922: read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
  923:     do(fun() ->
  924: 	       do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun)
  925:        end).
  926: 
  927: do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
  928:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, Options),
  929:     Res = do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F),
  930:     ok = file:close(F),
  931:     unicode:characters_to_list(Res, unicode).
  932: 
  933: do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F) ->
  934:     case Fun(F) of
  935: 	eof ->
  936: 	    [];
  937: 	{error,Error} ->
  938: 	    receive after 10000 -> ok end,
  939: 	    exit(Error);
  940: 	Other ->
  941: 	    [Other|do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F)]
  942:     end.
  943: 
  944: write_read_file(Fname0, N, Options, Enc, Writer) ->
  945:     Fname = Fname0 ++ "_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
  946:     do(fun() ->
  947: 	       do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Enc, Writer)
  948:        end).
  949: 
  950: do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Encoding, Writer) ->
  951:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, [{encoding,Encoding}|Options]),
  952:     Writer(F),
  953:     ok = file:close(F),
  954:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(Fname),
  955:     ok = file:delete(Fname),
  956:     Bin.
  957: 
  958: enc2str(Atom) when is_atom(Atom) ->
  959:     atom_to_list(Atom);
  960: enc2str({A1,A2}) when is_atom(A1), is_atom(A2) ->
  961:     atom_to_list(A1)++"_"++atom_to_list(A2).
  962: 
  963: 
  964: random_unicode(0) ->
  965:     %% io:fread(Device, Promp, "~ts") will return an error if the file
  966:     %% ends with whitespace characters. This behavior seems to be
  967:     %% deliberate. Therefore, be sure that we never end the file with
  968:     %% a sequence of whitespace characters.
  969:     [$! + rand:uniform(64) |
  970:      case rand:uniform(20) of
  971:          A when A =< 1 -> [$\n];
  972:          _ -> []
  973:      end];
  974: random_unicode(N) ->
  975:     %% Favor large unicode code points and make line breaks.
  976:     X = case rand:uniform(20) of
  977: 	    A when A =< 1 -> $\n;
  978: 	    A when A =< 3 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF);
  979: 	    A when A =< 6 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7F) + 16#7F;
  980: 	    A when A =< 12 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7FF) + 16#7FF;
  981: 	    _ -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#FFFF) + 16#FFFF
  982: 	end,
  983:     if
  984:         X =:= $\r;                            %Can be eaten by io:get_line/2.
  985:         16#D800 =< X, X =< 16#DFFF;
  986:         X =:= 16#FFFE;
  987:         X =:= 16#FFFF ->
  988: 	    random_unicode(N);
  989: 	true ->
  990: 	    [X | random_unicode(N-1)]
  991:     end.
  992: 
  993: 
  994: %% Test variants with binary option.
  995: binary_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  996:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  997:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  998:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(
  999: 		 [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
 1000: 		  1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
 1001: 		  1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
 1002: 		  32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
 1003: 		  963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963]),
 1004:     <<First10:10/binary,Second10:10/binary,_/binary>> = TestData,
 1005:     First10List = binary_to_list(First10),
 1006:     Second10List = binary_to_list(Second10),
 1007:     TestFile = filename:join([DataDir, "testdata_utf8.dat"]),
 1008:     {ok, F} = file:open(TestFile,[read]),
 1009:     {ok, First10List} = file:read(F,10),
 1010:     io:setopts(F,[binary]),
 1011:     {ok, Second10} = file:read(F,10),
 1012:     file:close(F),
 1013:     {ok, F2} = file:open(TestFile,[read,binary]),
 1014:     {ok, First10} = file:read(F2,10),
 1015:     io:setopts(F2,[list]),
 1016:     {ok, Second10List} = file:read(F2,10),
 1017:     file:position(F2,0),
 1018:     First10List = io:get_chars(F2,'',10),
 1019:     io:setopts(F2,[binary]),
 1020:     Second10 = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_chars(F2,'',10),unicode,latin1),
 1021:     file:close(F2),
 1022:     LineBreakFileName =  filename:join([PrivDir, "testdata.dat"]),
 1023:     LineBreakTestData = <<TestData/binary,$\n>>,
 1024:     LineBreakTestDataList = binary_to_list(LineBreakTestData),
 1025:     file:write_file(LineBreakFileName,[LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,TestData]),
 1026:     {ok, F3} = file:open(LineBreakFileName,[read]),
 1027:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1028:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
 1029:     LineBreakTestData =  unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
 1030:     io:setopts(F3,[list]),
 1031:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1032:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
 1033:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
 1034:     eof = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1035:     file:close(F3),
 1036: 
 1037:     %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
 1038:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1039: 	new ->
 1040: 	    rtnode:run(
 1041:               [{putline, "2."},
 1042:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1043:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1044:                {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1045:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1046:                {putline, "hej"},
 1047:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1048:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1049:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1050:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1051:                {putline, "hej"},
 1052:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1053:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1054:                {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1055:                {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1056:               ],[]);
 1057:         _ ->
 1058:             ok
 1059:     end,
 1060:     %% And one with oldshell
 1061:     rtnode:run(
 1062:       [{putline, "2."},
 1063:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1064:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1065:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1066:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1067:        {putline, "hej"},
 1068:        {expect, "[\n ]\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1069:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1070:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1071:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1072:        {putline, "hej"},
 1073:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1074:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1075:        {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1076:        {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1077:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
 1078:     ok.

 1113:        %% get_chars

 1116:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1117:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1118:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1119:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1120:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1121:        {putline, TestDataLine1},

 1123:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1124:        {expect, "Prompt"},

 1240: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1241: read_modes_ogl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1242:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1243: 	noshell ->
 1244: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1245: 	_ ->
 1246: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine2)
 1247:     end.
 1248: 
 1249: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1250: read_modes_gl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1251:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1252: 	noshell ->
 1253: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1254: 	old ->
 1255: 	    {skipped,"No new shell"};
 1256: 	_ ->
 1257: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine1)
 1258:     end.
 1259: 
 1260: read_modes_gl_1(_Config,Machine) ->
 1261:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1262:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1263:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = list_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1264: 
 1265:     N2List = peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1266:     MyNodeList = atom2list(node()),
 1267:     register(io_proto_suite,self()),
 1268:     AM1 = spawn(?MODULE,Machine,
 1269: 		[MyNodeList, "io_proto_suite", N2List]),
 1270: 
 1271:     GL = receive X when is_pid(X) -> X end,
 1272:     ?dbg({group_leader,X}),
 1273:     %% get_line
 1274:     receive after 500 -> ok end, % Dont clash with the new shell...
 1275:     "Hej\n" = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1276:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1277:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1278:     <<"Hej\n">> = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1279:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1280:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1281:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1282:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1283:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1284:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1285: 
 1286:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1287:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1288:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1289:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1290:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1291:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1292: 
 1293:     %%get_chars
 1294:     "Hej" = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1295:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1296:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1297:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1298:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1299:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1300:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1301:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1302:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1303:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1304: 
 1305:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1306:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1307:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1308:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1309:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1310:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1311:     %%fread
 1312:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1313:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1314:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1315:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1316:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1317:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1318:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1319:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1320:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1321:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1322:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1323:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1324:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1325:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1326:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1327:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1328: 
 1329: 
 1330:     receive
 1331: 	{AM1,done} ->
 1332: 	    ok
 1333:     after 5000 ->
 1334: 	    exit(timeout)
 1335:     end,
 1336:     ok.
 1337: 
 1338: 
 1339: %% Test behaviour when reading broken Unicode files
 1340: broken_unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1341:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1342:     Latin1Name = filename:join([Dir,"latin1_data_file.dat"]),
 1343:     Utf8Name = filename:join([Dir,"utf8_data_file.dat"]),
 1344:     Latin1Data = iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255)++[255,255,255])),
 1345:     Utf8Data = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1346: 		 lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255))),
 1347:     file:write_file(Latin1Name,Latin1Data),
 1348:     file:write_file(Utf8Name,Utf8Data),
 1349:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1350:     [ utf8 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Utf8Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1351:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf16) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1352:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf32) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1353:     ok.
 1354: 
 1355: 
 1356: %%
 1357: %% From the cookbook, more or less
 1358: heuristic_encoding_file2(FileName,Chunk,Enc) ->
 1359:     {ok,F} = file:open(FileName,[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
 1360:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1361: 
 1362: loop_through_file2(_,eof,_,Enc) ->
 1363:     Enc;
 1364: loop_through_file2(_,{error,_Err},_,_) ->
 1365:     latin1;
 1366: loop_through_file2(F,Bin,Chunk,Enc) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1367:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1368: 
 1369: %% Test eof before newline on stdin when erlang is in pipe.
 1370: eof_on_pipe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1371:     case {ct:get_progname(),os:type()} of
 1372: 	{Erl,{unix,linux}} ->
 1373: 	    %% Not even Linux is reliable - echo can be both styles
 1374: 	    try
 1375: 		EchoLine = case os:cmd("echo -ne \"test\\ntest\"") of
 1376: 			       "test\ntest" ->
 1377: 				   "echo -ne \"a\\nbu\" | ";
 1378: 			       _ ->
 1379: 				   case os:cmd("echo \"test\\ntest\\c\"") of
 1380: 				       "test\ntest" ->
 1381: 					   "echo \"a\\nbu\\c\" | ";
 1382: 				       _ ->
 1383: 					   throw(skip)
 1384: 				   end
 1385: 			   end,
 1386: 		CommandLine1 = EchoLine ++
 1387: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1388: 		    "'io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1389: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1390: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1391: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine1) of
 1392: 		    "\"a\\n\"\"bu\"eof" ->
 1393: 			ok;
 1394: 		    Other1 ->
 1395: 			exit({unexpected1,Other1})
 1396: 		end,
 1397: 		CommandLine2 = EchoLine ++
 1398: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1399: 		    "'io:setopts([binary]),io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1400: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1401: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1402: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine2) of
 1403: 		    "<<\"a\\n\">><<\"bu\">>eof" ->
 1404: 			ok;
 1405: 		    Other2 ->
 1406: 			exit({unexpected2,Other2})
 1407: 		end
 1408: 	    catch
 1409: 		throw:skip ->
 1410: 		    {skipped,"unsupported echo program"}
 1411: 	    end;
 1412: 	{_,_} ->
 1413: 	    {skipped,"Only on linux"}
 1414:     end.
 1415: 
 1416: raw_stdout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1417:     Cmd = lists:append(
 1418:             [ct:get_progname(),
 1419:              " -noshell -noinput",
 1420:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1421:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " write_raw_to_stdout"]),
 1422:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
 1423:     Port = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof]),
 1424:     Expected = lists:seq(0,255),
 1425:     Expected = get_all_port_data(Port, []),
 1426:     Port ! {self(), close},
 1427:     ok.
 1428: 
 1429: get_all_port_data(Port, Acc) ->
 1430:     receive
 1431:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 1432:             get_all_port_data(Port, [Acc|Data]);
 1433:         {Port, eof} ->
 1434:             lists:flatten(Acc)
 1435:     end.
 1436: 
 1437: write_raw_to_stdout() ->
 1438:     try
 1439:         ok = io:setopts(standard_io, [{encoding, latin1}]),
 1440:         ok = file:write(standard_io, lists:seq(0,255)),
 1441:         halt(0)
 1442:     catch
 1443:         Class:Reason:StackTrace ->
 1444:             io:format(standard_error, "~p~p~p", [Class, Reason, StackTrace]),
 1445:             halt(17)
 1446:     end.
 1447: 
 1448: raw_stdout_isatty(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1449:     rtnode:run(
 1450:         [{putline,"io:setopts(group_leader(), [{encoding, latin1}])."},
 1451:          {putline,"file:write(group_leader(),[90, 127, 128, 255, 131, 90, 10])."},%
 1452:          {expect, "\\QZ^?\\200\\377\\203Z\\E"}
 1453:         ],[]),
 1454:         ok.
 1455: %%
 1456: %% Test I/O-server
 1457: %%
 1458: 
 1459: start_io_server_proxy() ->
 1460:     spawn_link(?MODULE,io_server_proxy,[#state{}]).
 1461: 
 1462: proxy_getall(Pid) ->
 1463:     req(Pid,{self(),getall}).
 1464: proxy_setnext(Pid,Data) when is_list(Data) ->
 1465:     req(Pid,{self(),next,Data}).
 1466: proxy_quit(Pid) ->
 1467:     req(Pid,{self(),quit}).
 1468: 
 1469: req(Pid,Mess) ->
 1470:     Pid ! Mess,
 1471:     receive
 1472: 	{Pid, Answer} ->
 1473: 	    Answer
 1474:     after 5000 ->
 1475: 	    exit(timeout)
 1476:     end.
 1477: 
 1478: io_server_proxy(State) -> 
 1479:     receive
 1480:         {io_request, From, ReplyAs, Request} ->
 1481:             case request(Request,State) of
 1482:                 {Tag, Reply, NewState} when Tag =:= ok; Tag =:= error ->
 1483:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1484:                     io_server_proxy(NewState);
 1485:                 {stop, Reply, _NewState} ->
 1486:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1487:                     exit(Reply)
 1488:             end;
 1489:         %% Private message
 1490:         {From, next, Data} ->
 1491:             From ! {self(), ok},
 1492:             io_server_proxy(State#state{nxt = Data});
 1493:         {From, getall} ->
 1494:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1495:             io_server_proxy(State#state{q=[]});
 1496:         {From, quit} ->
 1497:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1498: 	    ok;
 1499:         _Unknown ->
 1500:             io_server_proxy(State)
 1501:     end.
 1502: 
 1503: reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply) ->
 1504:     From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, Reply}.
 1505: 
 1506: request({put_chars, Encoding, Chars}, State) ->
 1507:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Chars} | State#state.q ]}};
 1508: request({put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args}, State) ->
 1509:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args} | 
 1510: 			    State#state.q ]}};
 1511: request({get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As}, State) ->
 1512:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, q = [{get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As} | State#state.q]}};
 1513: request({get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N}, State) ->
 1514:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1515: 									   q = [{get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N} |
 1516: 										State#state.q]}};
 1517: request({get_line, Encoding, Prompt}, State) ->
 1518:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), 
 1519:      State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1520: 		 q = [{get_line, Encoding, Prompt} | 
 1521: 		      State#state.q]}};
 1522: request({get_geomentry,_}, State) ->
 1523:     {error, {error,enotsup}, State};
 1524: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, false}]; Opts =:= [list] ->
 1525:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = list}};
 1526: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, true}]; Opts =:= [binary] ->
 1527:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = binary}};
 1528: request(getopts, State) ->
 1529:     {ok, case State#state.mode of
 1530: 	     list -> [{binary,false}];
 1531: 	     binary -> [{binary, true}]
 1532: 	 end, State#state{q=[getopts | State#state.q ]}};
 1533: request({requests, Reqs}, State) ->
 1534:     multi_request(Reqs, {ok, ok, State}).
 1535: 
 1536: multi_request([R|Rs], {ok, _Res, State}) ->
 1537:     multi_request(Rs, request(R, State));
 1538: multi_request([_|_], Error) ->
 1539:     Error;
 1540: multi_request([], State) ->
 1541:     State.
 1542: 
 1543: convert(Atom,_,_) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1544:     Atom;
 1545: convert(Data, unicode, list) ->
 1546:     unicode:characters_to_list(Data,unicode);
 1547: convert(Data, latin1, list) ->
 1548:     try
 1549: 	L = unicode:characters_to_list(Data, unicode),
 1550: 	[ true = Ch =< 255 || Ch <- L ],
 1551: 	L
 1552:     catch
 1553: 	_:_ ->
 1554: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1555:     end;
 1556: convert(Data, unicode, binary) ->
 1557:     unicode:characters_to_binary(Data,unicode,unicode);
 1558: convert(Data, latin1, binary) ->
 1559:     case unicode:characters_to_binary(Data, unicode, latin1) of
 1560: 	Bin when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1561: 	    Bin;
 1562: 	_ ->
 1563: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1564:     end.
 1565: 
 1566: atom2list(A) ->
 1567:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w", [A])).
 1568: 
 1569: chomp([]) ->
 1570:     [];
 1571: chomp([$\n]) ->
 1572:     [];
 1573: chomp([H|T]) ->
 1574:     [H|chomp(T)];
 1575: chomp(<<>>) ->
 1576:     <<>>;
 1577: chomp(<<$\n>>) ->
 1578:     <<>>;
 1579: chomp(<<Ch,Rest/binary>>) ->
 1580:     X = chomp(Rest),
 1581:     <<Ch,X/binary>>;
 1582: chomp(Atom) ->
 1583:     Atom.
 1584: 
 1585: do(Fun) ->
 1586:     {_,Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 1587: 				    exit(Fun())
 1588: 			    end),
 1589:     Ref.
 1590: 
 1591: done(Ref) ->
 1592:     receive
 1593: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,_,Result} ->
 1594: 	    Result
 1595:     end.
